name: .IPF File Extension
summary: Learn about .IPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Preservation format used to preserve the content of Amiga floppy disks; formatted similarly to the .IFF (Interchangeable File Format) used on Amiga systems; developed by the Software Preservation Society (SPS) as a means of saving and archiving Amiga games and programs that are no longer developed.

content: The IPF format was designed for use with the Commodore Amiga, but can be used with Atari and PC files as well. It may contain disk images, ROM files, or any other type of digital media.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
